attributes.action: Allow the easing of the lockdown restrictions to carry on as planned.
attributes.additional_details: As a mobile DJ and entertainer it is very frustrating that I cannot carry on with my business, there are also many, many others in the same position. I therefore am petitioning the government to allow the restriction to ease as planned. I know there will be many people that feel the same way, it is really starting to effect my mental health as I am sure it is many others, if this carries on for much longer there isn't going to be a country to save, most of us will just all face financial ruin.
attributes.background: As long as deaths remain low and admissions to hospital remain at a manageable rate then lockdown restrictions should be ended on June the 21st as planned.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584862
